scripts.clean: npm run clean:coverage && rm dist/domsql.min.js && rm showcase/domsql.min.js
scripts.browserify:ugly: browserify src/domsql.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs -c > dist/domsql.min.js
scripts.shipIt: npm run coverage && npm run browserify:ugly && npm run distribute
scripts.deploy:fast: npm run browserify && npm run distribute
scripts.deploy:ugly: npm run browserify:ugly && npm run distribute
scripts.deploy:showcase: npm run deploy:ugly && npm run showcase
